[Information]

Silky Smooth Satin Tablecloth

Silky, smooth, and shiny satin always inspires people; there is an overwhelming charm and sophistication that this imperial fabric exudes. This attribute makes it a number one choice for decoration, embellishing and ornamenting. Our supreme quality Satin Tablecloths are fashioned with sublime refinement and extra smoothness to create one of a kind table linen for those special events that call for an extra dash of swanky urbanity and a red carpet treatment.

Royal Look & Effect

Spread these shimmering sheets atop your drab tables and plain table tops to create a perfect celebratory mood that will leave your guests in a complete awe of such a festal decoration. Oozing royal feel and luster, our Satin Tablecloths are ideal to give your plain tables and tablescapes a quick glamorous twist. Elevate the elegance of your tables manifold at wedding, birthday, holiday dinner, Christmas feast, and special events  by draping with these lush spreads.

     

Premium Quality

Dress your tables to the nines with our durable, reusable and totally adorable Satin Tablecloths that will give your guests an instant esteemed feel and royal treatment during your event. Fashioned from premium quality silky satin, these tablecloths can be used again and again to spruce your tables up without losing their regal luster and seamless sheen.

Multi-Use

Decorative

entry.title: 25 Pack - 12" Pastel Sage Green Round Latex Balloons - Matte Color Helium Balloons
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3220
Type: Decorations
Price: 2.49

[About]

Quantity: 25 Pastel Balloons
Material: Latex
Balloon Color: Pastel Sage Green
Shape: Round
Balloon Diameter: 12"
Float Time w/Helium: About 10-12 hours. Always good to inflate close to when the event starts so it lasts as long as the period of the event
Float Time w/Air: Putting Air in balloon will not make it float. But putting in air makes it last typically between 5-7 Days
Can use Air, Water, and Helium
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Fits any Events

Spread cheer and charm all around your space with these soft hued pastel balloons. Beautiful muted tones coupled with solid matte colors make these balloons a perfect decorative accessory to peerlessly pep up any space and event décor. Perfect for merry moments like Weddings, Showers, Birthdays, Graduations, Anniversaries, Halloween Party, Christmas Functions, Holiday Events, and any other celebration that calls for an extra dash of sophisticated elegance.

Stylish and Decorative

Create breathtaking Balloon Arches, Balloon Columns, Table Centerpieces, and Balloon Bouquets by clipping these latex balloons together with our Balloon Buckle Clips, or use in coordination with our Tassels, Pompoms, Foil Letter and Number Balloons and Banners for a fun-filled décor.

Highly Durable

Get the balloons inflated in no time with our Balloon Hand Pumps or Portable Electric Air Blower Balloon Pump Inflator. Robust latex construction gives these matte pastel balloons unsurpassed durability, keep these inflated for as long as you desire. Save time, money, and energy on Party Decoration with our exciting range of Party Balloon Supplies.

 

Additional Information:

  • Uses: Wedding, Ceiling Decoration, Hanging Decor, Birthday Party Balloons, Baby Shower, Prom Nights

[Information]

Our soft Chiffon Sashes are perhaps one of our most exquisite sash options! Sheer soft flowing feel and lightweight luxurious look of this sash adds the perfect delicate elegance touch to any event! Made from premium quality chiffon, the dreamlike draping effect of these sashes will transform your simple party chairs into royal seats. Besides having seamless stylish appearance, these sashes are also durable enough to continue accentuating your party chairs for many years with the same flawless flair.

Easy to shape and work with, chiffon fabric gives plenty of options to adorn your party or banquet chairs; pair with our Satin or Spandex Chair Belts and Covers, embellish with our Jeweled Sash Clips and Pins, or add our Sash Flowers for a refreshing feel. If you wish to make your event simply outshine all the rest, we recommend our favorite “weaved” style that can be created by interlacing multiple chiffon sashes on a Chiavari chair!

entry.title: 120 Pack DIY Balloon Garland Kit, Balloon Arch Party Decorations - Green, White, Jade, Clear
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3220
Type: Decorations
Price: 12.69

[About]

1 Quantity: 120 Balloon Garland Kit

12" Balloon Packs:

  • Mint Green: 10 Pcs 
  • Dark Green: 10 Pcs 
  • Jade: 15 Pcs 
  • White: 10 Pcs 
  • Clear with Silver Foil Confetti: 10 Pcs

5" Balloon Packs:

  • Lime Green: 15 Pcs
  • Mint Green: 10 Pcs
  • Dark Green: 20 Pcs
  • White: 20 Pcs

    Balloon Garland Kit:

    • Clear Plastic Chain: 5 Meters
    • Balloon Dots: Roll of 100
    • Balloon Tying Tool: 1 Qty
    • Garland instructions on pack
    Balloon Material: Latex
    Tying Tool Material: Plastic
    Color: Mint Green | Dark Green | Lime Green | Jade | White | Clear
    Shape: Sphere Balloon
    Need to create static for the confetti balloons to stick to sides
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    No festivity is complete without colorful festive balloons and to give you a huge dose of fun and frolic, our Balloon Kit in celebratory colors is an ideal option. Get any party started with our best quality balloons available in cheerful colors. Compared to the ordinary balloons available in the market, our sturdy balloons are bigger, bolder, and better!
    Fun, festive colors coupled with sleek smooth surface will instantly transform any dull space into an excitingly cheerful realm. Perfect for merry moments like Weddings, Showers, Birthdays, Graduations, Anniversaries, Halloween Party, Christmas Functions, Holiday Events, and any other celebration that calls for an extra dash of color and charisma.
    Create breathtaking Balloon Arches, Balloon Columns, Table Centerpieces, and Balloon Bouquets by clipping the balloons together with our Balloon Buckle Clips, or use in coordination with our Tassels, Pompoms, Foil Letter and Number Balloons and Banners for a fun-filled décor. Get the balloons inflated in no time with our Balloon Hand Pumps or Portable Electric Air Blower Balloon Pump Inflator. Save time, money, and energy on Party Decoration with our exciting range of Party Balloon Kits.

    Additional Information:

    • For Confetti Balloons: After inflated, please rub gently with wool gloves, sweater, carpet, cloth, hair and roll the balloons to get static so that the confetti stick to the wall the balloon. Pop the balloons will make a great fun when confetti flying out in party.
    • Float time is about 10 hrs for the 12" balloons. Blow balloons up with helium closer to the time of event for it to last.
    • The 5" balloons will likely not float due to the size of the balloon and the amount of helium it occupies.
    • Uses: Perfect for balloon arch decoration, baby shower, weddings, graduations, anniversaries, corporate events, engagements, BBQs, photo shoots and more!
    • High Quality: These balloons are made of latex material, strong and durable enough to inflate for decoration, safe to use.
    • WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD -- Children under 8 yrs. can choke or suffocate on uninflated or broken balloons. Adult supervision required. Keep uninflated balloons from children. Discard broken balloons at once. 

    How To Make Balloon Garland:

    • Inflate all balloons with air and tie a knot using Balloon Tying Tool.
    • Insert balloon lips into decorating strip holes and gently pull balloon knots through the holes to secure. Alternate balloon colors and sizes and skip holes as needed on decorating strip as you attach balloons.
    • Use the dot glue makes it easy to fill the gap of balloons with smaller balloons.
    • Tie a long piece of ribbon to an empty hole at each end of the decorating strip and hang garland against a wall or from the ceiling.

    NOTE: Total length depends on the setting of balloons. DIY item, total length may vary!
